Articles.Content: Well... basically I've tried some weapon mods (I say some because I don't know how many) and it crashes the world (BD Armory), breaks the camera (Lazor guided weapons), or just does no destruction and has lights no explosions (Skillful Weapons). I want to know what mod has working, not game breaking weapons or how to fix some-most of these.

Assuming that you used the latest version of KSP (1.0.5), Lazor guided weapons are outdated. BD Armory and skillful should be working, did you install all the required dependencies? (module manager etc)
I have latest module manager ( After earth ending to game breaking problems) and what is etc? I don't think there are other mods to cause mass destruction rather than game crashes.
